import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navbar2 from './Navbar2' import Footer from './Footer' import { Breadcrumb } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../CSS/style.css' export default class Services extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ name:'', email:'', contact:'', address:'', Category:'', restaurant:'', userId:'', list:[], list2:[] } this.state.list2= JSON.parse( localStorage.getItem('login')); this.state.userId = this.state.list2[0].id console.log(this.state.userId) fetch('http://localhost:8080/categories').then((resp) => { resp.json().then((data) => { console.log(data) this.state.list2 = data }) }) console.log(this.state.list2) } render() { return (
